price: Dan Kami kuatkan kerajaannya dan Kami berikan kepadanya hikmah 1302 dan kebijaksanaan  dalam menyelesaikan perselisihan.
arabic: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ
footnotes: 1302.  Maksud "hikmah" di sini ialah kenabian, kesempurnaan ilmu, dan ketelitian amal perbuatan.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: washadadnā mul'kahu waātaynāhu al-ḥik'mata wafaṣla al-khiṭābi
